overview:
Adetayo Kolade is the C.E.O at ERISOFT Microsystems and currently the Lead Tech Consultant for Oyo Themes Park and Gardens Limited

He started ERISOFT Microsystems, a web development company in January 2003 in Ibadan, Nigeria before proceeding to study Microbiology at Obafemi Awolowo University in 2004.

He is an Oracle Certified Database Administrator, and and avid web developer with interests in PHP, CSS and XHTML.

He is currently working on IBCityNet, a city wide network for the city he grew up in, Ibadan.

He is currently engaged to Bunmi Fadahunsi who is the Lead Graphics Designer at ERISOFT Microsystems.
